entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who couldn't believe anyone could be so interfering.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the person Harry spoke to.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who wasn't going to give up easily.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is mentioned as a portrait that Harry pushed open.
